keyFacts: The document details account transactions for Jeffrey Epstein from June 1, 2018, to June 30, 2018.
The beginning balance on June 1, 2018, was $62,229.38.
A total of $5,300,000.00 was credited to the account during this period.
Significant withdrawals included checks and preauthorized debits totaling over $50,000.
